descriptionHtml:
This mod removes the need for salt in food, including the new HearthFires recipes. I\'ll continue to update it as new foods come along in the game.

Why no salt? You don\'t need it in food, everything has some sodium in it naturally. But other than that, I find needing salt annoying. I want salt for my alchemy!

You can still use this mod if you don\'t have HearthFires. This mod should be compatible with any mod, unless they change recipes.

Steam version of this mod is also available here: http://tinyurl.com/9p2lkmz
author: Grover Rockwood
